markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Enhance Venom](/Feats.aspx?ID=4036) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vishkanya" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=369" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 63</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Moderate Enhance Venom](/Feats.aspx?ID=4030)

</column>

---

You upgrade the vishkanyan venom you can apply with [Envenom](/Actions.aspx?ID=1451) to greater vishkanyan venom. Envenom's frequency becomes once per minute.

 **Greater Vishkanyan Venom** (level 17) **Frequency** once per minute; **Saving Throw** Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 7d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 9d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 3** 11d6 poison damage (1 round)
name: Greater Enhance Venom
